de.gnwi.jdpd.utilities

Class CellBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gnwi.jdpd.utilities.CellBox
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParticlePairInteractionCalculator

    public class CellBox
extends java.lang.Object
    Parallelisation-safe cell-partitioned box as a basis for pairwise interaction calculations with finite cut-off length. For basic concept and discussion see M.P. Allen and D.J. Tildesley Computer Simulation of Liquids Clarendon Press Oxford 1987 Chapter 5.3
    Author:
    Achim Zielesny

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected BoxSize boxSize
      Box size
      protected int cellChunkSize
      Size of parallelisation-safe cell chunks
      protected int[][] cellNeigbours
      Cell neighbours
      protected int cellNumber
      Number of cells that partition box
      protected int cellNumberX
      Number of cells in x-direction
      protected int cellNumberY
      Number of cells in y-direction
      protected int cellNumberZ
      Number of cells in z-direction
      protected double cutOffLength
      Cut-off length for partitioning of the box
      protected double cutOffLengthX
      Cut-off length for partitioning of the box in x-direction
      protected double cutOffLengthY
      Cut-off length for partitioning of the box in y-direction
      protected double cutOffLengthZ
      Cut-off length for partitioning of the box in z-direction
      protected boolean isCellBasedCalculation
      True: Cell-based calculation may be performed, false: Full loop over particle index pairs is performed
      protected int[][] parallelizationSafeCellChunks
      Cell chunks that are parallelisation-safe
      protected PeriodicBoundaries periodicBoundaries
      Periodic boundaries
      protected ILogger simulationLogger
      Simulation simulationLogger

        aSimulationLogger - Simulation simulationLogger
        aBoxSize - Box size
        aPeriodicBoundaries - Periodic boundaries
        aCutOffLength - Cut-off length for partitioning of the box
        aCellNeigbours - Cell neighbours (may be null then cell neighbours are determined)
        aParallelizationSafeCellChunks - Cell chunks that are parallelisation-safe (may be null then cell chunks are determined)

        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if an argument is illegal
